document.full_text: bahraini forces used tanks and helicopters to drive protesters from the streets on wednesday clearing a camp that had become a symbol of the shi'ite muslim uprising and drawing rare criticism from their u.s. allies.
document.title: bahrain crushes protests, draws u.s. criticism
lines_and_colors: bahraini forces used tanks and helicopters to drive protesters from the streets on wednesday clearing a camp that had become a symbol of the shi'ite muslim uprising and drawing rare criticism from their u.s. allies.
